answers.author: Mark Kunkle
answers.text:
We have been outsourcing payroll for 20 years. The factors often considered are size of workforce, initial software costs and annual maintenance, capacity to process payroll and outsourcing costs. Advantages can be reduced costs both initially and ongoing, and retaining qualified and trained payroll processing personnel. Disadvantages can be timeliness of payroll processing, desired reporting may not be available, and sense of  loss of control.
Recently we changed payroll providers that are processing on cloud based software with better reporting, employee self reporting work time, and integrating leave tracking. Employees can now access their available leave time when desired.

Hi Mark--Our company specializes in workforce management for municipalities.  Our platform is cloud-based and completely scalable. We can automate the hiring process, onboarding of employees, tracking time and also the payroll and HR Process.  Let me know if you have any specific questions.  Timekeeping for police and fire can be a big headache.  We can help with that as well.
